title: 85.0 worked fine, 85.0.2 won't load any sites
content:
Just as the subject line says: everything was fine with 85.0 (or maybe it was 85.0.1, since I always install updates). 85.0.2 would not load any sites, but another browser did. I had to uninstall the update and re-install 85.0.

Is there a known issue that will be fixed soon? It's time-consuming to go through the uninstallation/reinstallation process and I'm afraid to say yes to the update until I know I won't have to keep doing this. Thanks.
creator: meika21

title: I am being prevented from downloading Firefox on my PC
content:
Hi there,

I am having difficulties today. I was downloading a surveying software program and it appears to have made changes to my computer, such that it destroyed my ability to use Firefox. I have uninstalled it and tried installing it several times . . . and I get the same error coming up (see attached screen save).

Can you assist me in being able to install Firefox again.

Thank you.

title: System Error/Webpages will not load
content: All of a sudden my firefox will not load any webpages, keeps saying it is already open, and giving me a system error code saying there is a file missing. I tried going into task manager to close it manually which didn't work. I tried shutting off my laptop altogether which didn't work either. I also tried doing the refresh option after uninstalling and reinstalling and that did not work. This is the only application on my computer doing this, and it is not an internet issue because I am asking about this while using microsoft edge. I am not sure what to do and am becoming frustrated because a lot of passwords I don't have written down are attached to my firefox browser and I just don't like microsoft edge or chrome as much. I attached a photo of the error I am getting, as well as the blank webpage I get when I try to use the program. If anyone has any advice on this or knows how to fix the issue I would appreciate any help greatly. Thanks so much!
creator: lexilou902

title: Firefox remains minimized on task bar in Windows 10
content: I restarted Windows 10 for updates and when I tried to log onto the internet using Firefox it remained minimized. I looked at some recommendations, but they were mostly referring to earlier Windows versions. There was one site, but I am not tech savvy enough to understand. Anybody out there with simple solutions?
creator: samgodwin
